result.name: binomial

result.pre: is very sensitive to low temperatures. Here, we performed de novo transcriptome assembly of
result.post: var . pilosum using the Trinity program and obtained 42,816 assembled unigenes. By analyzin
result.name: binomial

result.name: binomial
